Drug 1 Drug 2 Interaction Type Clinical Significance Management
Warfarin Aspirin Increased risk of bleeding High Monitor INR closely; consider alternative therapy
Simvastatin Grapefruit juice Increased levels of Drug 1 Moderate Avoid concurrent use
Metformin Cimetidine Increased levels of Drug 1 Moderate Adjust dose or monitor blood glucose
Digoxin Verapamil Increased levels of Drug 1 High Monitor Digoxin levels; adjust dose if necessary
Clopidogrel Omeprazole Reduced effectiveness of Drug 1 Moderate Consider alternative PPI or monitor
Fluoxetine Tramadol Increased risk of serotonin syndrome High Avoid combination if possible
Lisinopril Spironolactone Increased risk of hyperkalemia High Monitor serum potassium levels
Amiodarone Warfarin Increased risk of bleeding High Monitor INR closely; adjust Warfarin dose
Rifampin Oral contraceptives Decreased effectiveness of Drug 2 High Use alternative contraception
Amitriptyline Fluoxetine Increased risk of serotonin syndrome High Monitor for serotonin syndrome

Amitriptyline Fluoxetine Increased risk of serotonin syndrome High Monitor for serotonin syndrome
Warfarin Aspirin Increased risk of bleeding High Monitor INR closely; consider alternative therapy
Simvastatin Grapefruit juice Increased levels of Drug 1 Moderate Avoid concurrent use
Metformin Cimetidine Increased levels of Drug 1 Moderate Adjust dose or monitor blood glucose
Digoxin Verapamil Increased levels of Drug 1 High Monitor Digoxin levels; adjust dose if necessary
Clopidogrel Omeprazole Reduced effectiveness of Drug 1 Moderate Consider alternative PPI or monitor

Fluoxetine Tramadol Increased risk of serotonin syndrome High Avoid combination if possible
Lisinopril Spironolactone Increased risk of hyperkalemia High Monitor serum potassium levels
Amiodarone Warfarin Increased risk of bleeding High Monitor INR closely; adjust Warfarin dose
Rifampin Oral contraceptives Decreased effectiveness of Drug 2 High Use alternative contraception
Amitriptyline Fluoxetine Increased risk of serotonin syndrome High Monitor for serotonin syndrome
Warfarin Aspirin Increased risk of bleeding High Monitor INR closely; consider alternative therapy
Simvastatin Grapefruit juice Increased levels of Drug 1 Moderate Avoid concurrent use
Metformin Cimetidine Increased levels of Drug 1 Moderate Adjust dose or monitor blood glucose
Digoxin Verapamil Increased levels of Drug 1 High Monitor Digoxin levels; adjust dose if necessary
Clopidogrel Omeprazole Reduced effectiveness of Drug 1 Moderate Consider alternative PPI or monitor

Enalapril Potassium supplements Increased risk of hyperkalemia Moderate Monitor serum potassium levels
Furosemide Aminoglycosides Increased risk of ototoxicity High Avoid combination or monitor hearing function
Carbamazepine Erythromycin Increased levels of Drug 1 High Monitor Carbamazepine levels; adjust dose
Methotrexate NSAIDs Increased risk of methotrexate toxicity High Avoid combination or monitor closely
Phenytoin Oral contraceptives Decreased effectiveness of Drug 2 High Use alternative contraception
Sildenafil Nitrates Severe hypotension High Contraindicated; avoid combination
Levothyroxine Calcium supplements Decreased absorption of Drug 1 Moderate Separate doses by at least 4 hours

Fluoxetine Tramadol Increased risk of serotonin syndrome High Avoid combination if possible
Lisinopril Spironolactone Increased risk of hyperkalemia High Monitor serum potassium levels
Amiodarone Warfarin Increased risk of bleeding High Monitor INR closely; adjust Warfarin dose
Rifampin Oral contraceptives Decreased effectiveness of Drug 2 High Use alternative contraception
Amitriptyline Fluoxetine Increased risk of serotonin syndrome High Monitor for serotonin syndrome
Ciprofloxacin Theophylline Increased levels of Drug 2 Moderate Monitor Theophylline levels; adjust dose
Lithium Thiazide diuretics Increased risk of lithium toxicity High Monitor lithium levels; consider dose adjustment
Enalapril Potassium supplements Increased risk of hyperkalemia Moderate Monitor serum potassium levels
Furosemide Aminoglycosides Increased risk of ototoxicity High Avoid combination or monitor hearing function
Carbamazepine Erythromycin Increased levels of Drug 1 High Monitor Carbamazepine levels; adjust dose
Methotrexate NSAIDs Increased risk of methotrexate toxicity High Avoid combination or monitor closely
Phenytoin Oral contraceptives Decreased effectiveness of Drug 2 High Use alternative contraception
Sildenafil Nitrates Severe hypotension High Contraindicated; avoid combination
Levothyroxine Calcium supplements Decreased absorption of Drug 1 Moderate Separate doses by at least 4 hours

Rifampin Oral contraceptives Decreased effectiveness of Drug 2 High Use alternative contraception
Amitriptyline Fluoxetine Increased risk of serotonin syndrome High Monitor for serotonin syndrome
Ciprofloxacin Theophylline Increased levels of Drug 2 Moderate Monitor Theophylline levels; adjust dose
Lithium Thiazide diuretics Increased risk of lithium toxicity High Monitor lithium levels; consider dose adjustment
Enalapril Potassium supplements Increased risk of hyperkalemia Moderate Monitor serum potassium levels
Furosemide Aminoglycosides Increased risk of ototoxicity High Avoid combination or monitor hearing function
Carbamazepine Erythromycin Increased levels of Drug 1 High Monitor Carbamazepine levels; adjust dose
Methotrexate NSAIDs Increased risk of methotrexate toxicity High Avoid combination or monitor closely
Phenytoin Oral contraceptives Decreased effectiveness of Drug 2 High Use alternative contraception
Sildenafil Nitrates Severe hypotension High Contraindicated; avoid combination
Levothyroxine Calcium supplements Decreased absorption of Drug 1 Moderate Separate doses by at least 4 hours
Diltiazem Beta-blockers Increased risk of bradycardia High Monitor heart rate; adjust therapy if needed
Azithromycin Warfarin Increased risk of bleeding Moderate Monitor INR; adjust Warfarin dose as needed
Isoniazid Phenytoin Increased levels of Drug 2 Moderate Monitor Phenytoin levels; adjust dose
Quinolones Corticosteroids Increased risk of tendon rupture Moderate Advise patient on risks; monitor for symptoms
Ketoconazole Cyclosporine Increased levels of Drug 2 High Monitor Cyclosporine levels; adjust dose
SSRIs MAOIs Increased risk of serotonin syndrome High Contraindicated; avoid combination
Methotrexate Trimethoprim Increased risk of bone marrow suppression High Avoid combination if possible
Tamoxifen Warfarin Increased risk of bleeding High Monitor INR closely; adjust Warfarin dose
ACE inhibitors NSAIDs Reduced antihypertensive effect Moderate Monitor blood pressure; adjust therapy

Lithium Thiazide diuretics Increased risk of lithium toxicity High Monitor lithium levels; consider dose adjustment
Enalapril Potassium supplements Increased risk of hyperkalemia Moderate Monitor serum potassium levels
Furosemide Aminoglycosides Increased risk of ototoxicity High Avoid combination or monitor hearing function
Carbamazepine Erythromycin Increased levels of Drug 1 High Monitor Carbamazepine levels; adjust dose
Methotrexate NSAIDs Increased risk of methotrexate toxicity High Avoid combination or monitor closely
Phenytoin Oral contraceptives Decreased effectiveness of Drug 2 High Use alternative contraception
Sildenafil Nitrates Severe hypotension High Contraindicated; avoid combination
Levothyroxine Calcium supplements Decreased absorption of Drug 1 Moderate Separate doses by at least 4 hours
Diltiazem Beta-blockers Increased risk of bradycardia High Monitor heart rate; adjust therapy if needed
Azithromycin Warfarin Increased risk of bleeding Moderate Monitor INR; adjust Warfarin dose as needed
Isoniazid Phenytoin Increased levels of Drug 2 Moderate Monitor Phenytoin levels; adjust dose
Quinolones Corticosteroids Increased risk of tendon rupture Moderate Advise patient on risks; monitor for symptoms
Ketoconazole Cyclosporine Increased levels of Drug 2 High Monitor Cyclosporine levels; adjust dose
SSRIs MAOIs Increased risk of serotonin syndrome High Contraindicated; avoid combination
Methotrexate Trimethoprim Increased risk of bone marrow suppression High Avoid combination if possible
Tamoxifen Warfarin Increased risk of bleeding High Monitor INR closely; adjust Warfarin dose
ACE inhibitors NSAIDs Reduced antihypertensive effect Moderate Monitor blood pressure; adjust therapy
Tetracycline Iron supplements Decreased absorption of Drug 1 Moderate Separate doses by at least 2 hours

Warfarin Aspirin Increased risk of bleeding High Monitor INR closely; consider alternative therapy

Metformin Cimetidine Increased levels of Drug 1 Moderate Adjust dose or monitor blood glucose

Carbamazepine Erythromycin Increased levels of Drug 1 High Monitor Carbamazepine levels; adjust dose
Methotrexate NSAIDs Increased risk of methotrexate toxicity High Avoid combination or monitor closely
Phenytoin Oral contraceptives Decreased effectiveness of Drug 2 High Use alternative contraception
Sildenafil Nitrates Severe hypotension High Contraindicated; avoid combination
Levothyroxine Calcium supplements Decreased absorption of Drug 1 Moderate Separate doses by at least 4 hours
Diltiazem Beta-blockers Increased risk of bradycardia High Monitor heart rate; adjust therapy if needed
Azithromycin Warfarin Increased risk of bleeding Moderate Monitor INR; adjust Warfarin dose as needed
Isoniazid Phenytoin Increased levels of Drug 2 Moderate Monitor Phenytoin levels; adjust dose
Quinolones Corticosteroids Increased risk of tendon rupture Moderate Advise patient on risks; monitor for symptoms
Ketoconazole Cyclosporine Increased levels of Drug 2 High Monitor Cyclosporine levels; adjust dose
SSRIs MAOIs Increased risk of serotonin syndrome High Contraindicated; avoid combination
Methotrexate Trimethoprim Increased risk of bone marrow suppression High Avoid combination if possible
Tamoxifen Warfarin Increased risk of bleeding High Monitor INR closely; adjust Warfarin dose
ACE inhibitors NSAIDs Reduced antihypertensive effect Moderate Monitor blood pressure; adjust therapy
Tetracycline Iron supplements Decreased absorption of Drug 1 Moderate Separate doses by at least 2 hours
Clarithromycin Simvastatin Increased risk of myopathy High Avoid concurrent use or monitor CK levels
Warfarin Aspirin Increased risk of bleeding High Monitor INR closely; consider alternative therapy
Simvastatin Grapefruit juice Increased levels of Drug 1 Moderate Avoid concurrent use
Metformin Cimetidine Increased levels of Drug 1 Moderate Adjust dose or monitor blood glucose
Digoxin Verapamil Increased levels of Drug 1 High Monitor Digoxin levels; adjust dose if necessary
Clopidogrel Omeprazole Reduced effectiveness of Drug 1 Moderate Consider alternative PPI or monitor

Sildenafil Nitrates Severe hypotension High Contraindicated; avoid combination
Levothyroxine Calcium supplements Decreased absorption of Drug 1 Moderate Separate doses by at least 4 hours
Diltiazem Beta-blockers Increased risk of bradycardia High Monitor heart rate; adjust therapy if needed
Azithromycin Warfarin Increased risk of bleeding Moderate Monitor INR; adjust Warfarin dose as needed
Isoniazid Phenytoin Increased levels of Drug 2 Moderate Monitor Phenytoin levels; adjust dose
Quinolones Corticosteroids Increased risk of tendon rupture Moderate Advise patient on risks; monitor for symptoms
Ketoconazole Cyclosporine Increased levels of Drug 2 High Monitor Cyclosporine levels; adjust dose

Methotrexate Trimethoprim Increased risk of bone marrow suppression High Avoid combination if possible

ACE inhibitors NSAIDs Reduced antihypertensive effect Moderate Monitor blood pressure; adjust therapy

Metformin Cimetidine Increased levels of Drug 1 Moderate Adjust dose or monitor blood glucose

Azithromycin Warfarin Increased risk of bleeding Moderate Monitor INR; adjust Warfarin dose as needed
Isoniazid Phenytoin Increased levels of Drug 2 Moderate Monitor Phenytoin levels; adjust dose
Quinolones Corticosteroids Increased risk of tendon rupture Moderate Advise patient on risks; monitor for symptoms
Ketoconazole Cyclosporine Increased levels of Drug 2 High Monitor Cyclosporine levels; adjust dose
SSRIs MAOIs Increased risk of serotonin syndrome High Contraindicated; avoid combination
Methotrexate Trimethoprim Increased risk of bone marrow suppression High Avoid combination if possible
Tamoxifen Warfarin Increased risk of bleeding High Monitor INR closely; adjust Warfarin dose
ACE inhibitors NSAIDs Reduced antihypertensive effect Moderate Monitor blood pressure; adjust therapy
Tetracycline Iron supplements Decreased absorption of Drug 1 Moderate Separate doses by at least 2 hours
Clarithromycin Simvastatin Increased risk of myopathy High Avoid concurrent use or monitor CK levels
Warfarin Aspirin Increased risk of bleeding High Monitor INR closely; consider alternative therapy
Simvastatin Grapefruit juice Increased levels of Drug 1 Moderate Avoid concurrent use
Metformin Cimetidine Increased levels of Drug 1 Moderate Adjust dose or monitor blood glucose
Digoxin Verapamil Increased levels of Drug 1 High Monitor Digoxin levels; adjust dose if necessary
Clopidogrel Omeprazole Reduced effectiveness of Drug 1 Moderate Consider alternative PPI or monitor
Fluoxetine Tramadol Increased risk of serotonin syndrome High Avoid combination if possible
Lisinopril Spironolactone Increased risk of hyperkalemia High Monitor serum potassium levels
Amiodarone Warfarin Increased risk of bleeding High Monitor INR closely; adjust Warfarin dose
Rifampin Oral contraceptives Decreased effectiveness of Drug 2 High Use alternative contraception
Amitriptyline Fluoxetine Increased risk of serotonin syndrome High Monitor for serotonin syndrome
Ciprofloxacin Theophylline Increased levels of Drug 2 Moderate Monitor Theophylline levels; adjust dose
Lithium Thiazide diuretics Increased risk of lithium toxicity High Monitor lithium levels; consider dose adjustment

Furosemide Aminoglycosides Increased risk of ototoxicity High Avoid combination or monitor hearing function

Quinolones Corticosteroids Increased risk of tendon rupture Moderate Advise patient on risks; monitor for symptoms
Ketoconazole Cyclosporine Increased levels of Drug 2 High Monitor Cyclosporine levels; adjust dose
SSRIs MAOIs Increased risk of serotonin syndrome High Contraindicated; avoid combination
Methotrexate Trimethoprim Increased risk of bone marrow suppression High Avoid combination if possible
Tamoxifen Warfarin Increased risk of bleeding High Monitor INR closely; adjust Warfarin dose
ACE inhibitors NSAIDs Reduced antihypertensive effect Moderate Monitor blood pressure; adjust therapy
Tetracycline Iron supplements Decreased absorption of Drug 1 Moderate Separate doses by at least 2 hours
Clarithromycin Simvastatin Increased risk of myopathy High Avoid concurrent use or monitor CK levels
Warfarin Aspirin Increased risk of bleeding High Monitor INR closely; consider alternative therapy
Simvastatin Grapefruit juice Increased levels of Drug 1 Moderate Avoid concurrent use
Metformin Cimetidine Increased levels of Drug 1 Moderate Adjust dose or monitor blood glucose
Digoxin Verapamil Increased levels of Drug 1 High Monitor Digoxin levels; adjust dose if necessary
Clopidogrel Omeprazole Reduced effectiveness of Drug 1 Moderate Consider alternative PPI or monitor
Fluoxetine Tramadol Increased risk of serotonin syndrome High Avoid combination if possible
Lisinopril Spironolactone Increased risk of hyperkalemia High Monitor serum potassium levels
Amiodarone Warfarin Increased risk of bleeding High Monitor INR closely; adjust Warfarin dose
Rifampin Oral contraceptives Decreased effectiveness of Drug 2 High Use alternative contraception
Amitriptyline Fluoxetine Increased risk of serotonin syndrome High Monitor for serotonin syndrome
Ciprofloxacin Theophylline Increased levels of Drug 2 Moderate Monitor Theophylline levels; adjust dose
Lithium Thiazide diuretics Increased risk of lithium toxicity High Monitor lithium levels; consider dose adjustment
Enalapril Potassium supplements Increased risk of hyperkalemia Moderate Monitor serum potassium levels
Furosemide Aminoglycosides Increased risk of ototoxicity High Avoid combination or monitor hearing function

Methotrexate NSAIDs Increased risk of methotrexate toxicity High Avoid combination or monitor closely

Methotrexate Trimethoprim Increased risk of bone marrow suppression High Avoid combination if possible
Tamoxifen Warfarin Increased risk of bleeding High Monitor INR closely; adjust Warfarin dose
ACE inhibitors NSAIDs Reduced antihypertensive effect Moderate Monitor blood pressure; adjust therapy
Tetracycline Iron supplements Decreased absorption of Drug 1 Moderate Separate doses by at least 2 hours
Clarithromycin Simvastatin Increased risk of myopathy High Avoid concurrent use or monitor CK levels
Warfarin Aspirin Increased risk of bleeding High Monitor INR closely; consider alternative therapy
Simvastatin Grapefruit juice Increased levels of Drug 1 Moderate Avoid concurrent use
Metformin Cimetidine Increased levels of Drug 1 Moderate Adjust dose or monitor blood glucose
Digoxin Verapamil Increased levels of Drug 1 High Monitor Digoxin levels; adjust dose if necessary
Clopidogrel Omeprazole Reduced effectiveness of Drug 1 Moderate Consider alternative PPI or monitor
Fluoxetine Tramadol Increased risk of serotonin syndrome High Avoid combination if possible
Lisinopril Spironolactone Increased risk of hyperkalemia High Monitor serum potassium levels
Amiodarone Warfarin Increased risk of bleeding High Monitor INR closely; adjust Warfarin dose
Rifampin Oral contraceptives Decreased effectiveness of Drug 2 High Use alternative contraception
Amitriptyline Fluoxetine Increased risk of serotonin syndrome High Monitor for serotonin syndrome
Ciprofloxacin Theophylline Increased levels of Drug 2 Moderate Monitor Theophylline levels; adjust dose
Lithium Thiazide diuretics Increased risk of lithium toxicity High Monitor lithium levels; consider dose adjustment
Enalapril Potassium supplements Increased risk of hyperkalemia Moderate Monitor serum potassium levels
Furosemide Aminoglycosides Increased risk of ototoxicity High Avoid combination or monitor hearing function

Tetracycline Iron supplements Decreased absorption of Drug 1 Moderate Separate doses by at least 2 hours
Clarithromycin Simvastatin Increased risk of myopathy High Avoid concurrent use or monitor CK levels
Warfarin Aspirin Increased risk of bleeding High Monitor INR closely; consider alternative therapy
Simvastatin Grapefruit juice Increased levels of Drug 1 Moderate Avoid concurrent use
Metformin Cimetidine Increased levels of Drug 1 Moderate Adjust dose or monitor blood glucose
Digoxin Verapamil Increased levels of Drug 1 High Monitor Digoxin levels; adjust dose if necessary
Clopidogrel Omeprazole Reduced effectiveness of Drug 1 Moderate Consider alternative PPI or monitor
Fluoxetine Tramadol Increased risk of serotonin syndrome High Avoid combination if possible
Lisinopril Spironolactone Increased risk of hyperkalemia High Monitor serum potassium levels
Amiodarone Warfarin Increased risk of bleeding High Monitor INR closely; adjust Warfarin dose
Rifampin Oral contraceptives Decreased effectiveness of Drug 2 High Use alternative contraception
Amitriptyline Fluoxetine Increased risk of serotonin syndrome High Monitor for serotonin syndrome
Ciprofloxacin Theophylline Increased levels of Drug 2 Moderate Monitor Theophylline levels; adjust dose
Lithium Thiazide diuretics Increased risk of lithium toxicity High Monitor lithium levels; consider dose adjustment
Enalapril Potassium supplements Increased risk of hyperkalemia Moderate Monitor serum potassium levels
Furosemide Aminoglycosides Increased risk of ototoxicity High Avoid combination or monitor hearing function
Carbamazepine Erythromycin Increased levels of Drug 1 High Monitor Carbamazepine levels; adjust dose
Methotrexate NSAIDs Increased risk of methotrexate toxicity High Avoid combination or monitor closely
Phenytoin Oral contraceptives Decreased effectiveness of Drug 2 High Use alternative contraception

Warfarin Aspirin Increased risk of bleeding High Monitor INR closely; consider alternative therapy
Simvastatin Grapefruit juice Increased levels of Drug 1 Moderate Avoid concurrent use
Metformin Cimetidine Increased levels of Drug 1 Moderate Adjust dose or monitor blood glucose
Digoxin Verapamil Increased levels of Drug 1 High Monitor Digoxin levels; adjust dose if necessary
Clopidogrel Omeprazole Reduced effectiveness of Drug 1 Moderate Consider alternative PPI or monitor
Fluoxetine Tramadol Increased risk of serotonin syndrome High Avoid combination if possible
Lisinopril Spironolactone Increased risk of hyperkalemia High Monitor serum potassium levels
Amiodarone Warfarin Increased risk of bleeding High Monitor INR closely; adjust Warfarin dose
Rifampin Oral contraceptives Decreased effectiveness of Drug 2 High Use alternative contraception
Amitriptyline Fluoxetine Increased risk of serotonin syndrome High Monitor for serotonin syndrome
Ciprofloxacin Theophylline Increased levels of Drug 2 Moderate Monitor Theophylline levels; adjust dose
Lithium Thiazide diuretics Increased risk of lithium toxicity High Monitor lithium levels; consider dose adjustment
Enalapril Potassium supplements Increased risk of hyperkalemia Moderate Monitor serum potassium levels
Furosemide Aminoglycosides Increased risk of ototoxicity High Avoid combination or monitor hearing function
Carbamazepine Erythromycin Increased levels of Drug 1 High Monitor Carbamazepine levels; adjust dose
Methotrexate NSAIDs Increased risk of methotrexate toxicity High Avoid combination or monitor closely
Phenytoin Oral contraceptives Decreased effectiveness of Drug 2 High Use alternative contraception
Sildenafil Nitrates Severe hypotension High Contraindicated; avoid combination
Levothyroxine Calcium supplements Decreased absorption of Drug 1 Moderate Separate doses by at least 4 hours
Diltiazem Beta-blockers Increased risk of bradycardia High Monitor heart rate; adjust therapy if needed
Azithromycin Warfarin Increased risk of bleeding Moderate Monitor INR; adjust Warfarin dose as needed
Isoniazid Phenytoin Increased levels of Drug 2 Moderate Monitor Phenytoin levels; adjust dose
Quinolones Corticosteroids Increased risk of tendon rupture Moderate Advise patient on risks; monitor for symptoms
Ketoconazole Cyclosporine Increased levels of Drug 2 High Monitor Cyclosporine levels; adjust dose
SSRIs MAOIs Increased risk of serotonin syndrome High Contraindicated; avoid combination
Methotrexate Trimethoprim Increased risk of bone marrow suppression High Avoid combination if possible
Tamoxifen Warfarin Increased risk of bleeding High Monitor INR closely; adjust Warfarin dose
ACE inhibitors NSAIDs Reduced antihypertensive effect Moderate Monitor blood pressure; adjust therapy

Clopidogrel Omeprazole Reduced effectiveness of Drug 1 Moderate Consider alternative PPI or monitor
Fluoxetine Tramadol Increased risk of serotonin syndrome High Avoid combination if possible
Lisinopril Spironolactone Increased risk of hyperkalemia High Monitor serum potassium levels
Amiodarone Warfarin Increased risk of bleeding High Monitor INR closely; adjust Warfarin dose
Rifampin Oral contraceptives Decreased effectiveness of Drug 2 High Use alternative contraception
Amitriptyline Fluoxetine Increased risk of serotonin syndrome High Monitor for serotonin syndrome
Ciprofloxacin Theophylline Increased levels of Drug 2 Moderate Monitor Theophylline levels; adjust dose
Lithium Thiazide diuretics Increased risk of lithium toxicity High Monitor lithium levels; consider dose adjustment
Enalapril Potassium supplements Increased risk of hyperkalemia Moderate Monitor serum potassium levels
Furosemide Aminoglycosides Increased risk of ototoxicity High Avoid combination or monitor hearing function
Carbamazepine Erythromycin Increased levels of Drug 1 High Monitor Carbamazepine levels; adjust dose
Methotrexate NSAIDs Increased risk of methotrexate toxicity High Avoid combination or monitor closely
Phenytoin Oral contraceptives Decreased effectiveness of Drug 2 High Use alternative contraception
Sildenafil Nitrates Severe hypotension High Contraindicated; avoid combination
Levothyroxine Calcium supplements Decreased absorption of Drug 1 Moderate Separate doses by at least 4 hours

Amiodarone Warfarin Increased risk of bleeding High Monitor INR closely; adjust Warfarin dose
Rifampin Oral contraceptives Decreased effectiveness of Drug 2 High Use alternative contraception
Amitriptyline Fluoxetine Increased risk of serotonin syndrome High Monitor for serotonin syndrome
Ciprofloxacin Theophylline Increased levels of Drug 2 Moderate Monitor Theophylline levels; adjust dose
Lithium Thiazide diuretics Increased risk of lithium toxicity High Monitor lithium levels; consider dose adjustment
Enalapril Potassium supplements Increased risk of hyperkalemia Moderate Monitor serum potassium levels
Furosemide Aminoglycosides Increased risk of ototoxicity High Avoid combination or monitor hearing function
Carbamazepine Erythromycin Increased levels of Drug 1 High Monitor Carbamazepine levels; adjust dose
Methotrexate NSAIDs Increased risk of methotrexate toxicity High Avoid combination or monitor closely
Phenytoin Oral contraceptives Decreased effectiveness of Drug 2 High Use alternative contraception
Sildenafil Nitrates Severe hypotension High Contraindicated; avoid combination
Levothyroxine Calcium supplements Decreased absorption of Drug 1 Moderate Separate doses by at least 4 hours
Diltiazem Beta-blockers Increased risk of bradycardia High Monitor heart rate; adjust therapy if needed
Azithromycin Warfarin Increased risk of bleeding Moderate Monitor INR; adjust Warfarin dose as needed
Isoniazid Phenytoin Increased levels of Drug 2 Moderate Monitor Phenytoin levels; adjust dose
Quinolones Corticosteroids Increased risk of tendon rupture Moderate Advise patient on risks; monitor for symptoms
Ketoconazole Cyclosporine Increased levels of Drug 2 High Monitor Cyclosporine levels; adjust dose

Methotrexate Trimethoprim Increased risk of bone marrow suppression High Avoid combination if possible
Tamoxifen Warfarin Increased risk of bleeding High Monitor INR closely; adjust Warfarin dose
ACE inhibitors NSAIDs Reduced antihypertensive effect Moderate Monitor blood pressure; adjust therapy

Ciprofloxacin Theophylline Increased levels of Drug 2 Moderate Monitor Theophylline levels; adjust dose
Lithium Thiazide diuretics Increased risk of lithium toxicity High Monitor lithium levels; consider dose adjustment
Enalapril Potassium supplements Increased risk of hyperkalemia Moderate Monitor serum potassium levels
Furosemide Aminoglycosides Increased risk of ototoxicity High Avoid combination or monitor hearing function
Carbamazepine Erythromycin Increased levels of Drug 1 High Monitor Carbamazepine levels; adjust dose
Methotrexate NSAIDs Increased risk of methotrexate toxicity High Avoid combination or monitor closely
Phenytoin Oral contraceptives Decreased effectiveness of Drug 2 High Use alternative contraception
Sildenafil Nitrates Severe hypotension High Contraindicated; avoid combination
Levothyroxine Calcium supplements Decreased absorption of Drug 1 Moderate Separate doses by at least 4 hours
Diltiazem Beta-blockers Increased risk of bradycardia High Monitor heart rate; adjust therapy if needed
Azithromycin Warfarin Increased risk of bleeding Moderate Monitor INR; adjust Warfarin dose as needed
Isoniazid Phenytoin Increased levels of Drug 2 Moderate Monitor Phenytoin levels; adjust dose
Quinolones Corticosteroids Increased risk of tendon rupture Moderate Advise patient on risks; monitor for symptoms
Ketoconazole Cyclosporine Increased levels of Drug 2 High Monitor Cyclosporine levels; adjust dose
SSRIs MAOIs Increased risk of serotonin syndrome High Contraindicated; avoid combination
Methotrexate Trimethoprim Increased risk of bone marrow suppression High Avoid combination if possible
Tamoxifen Warfarin Increased risk of bleeding High Monitor INR closely; adjust Warfarin dose
ACE inhibitors NSAIDs Reduced antihypertensive effect Moderate Monitor blood pressure; adjust therapy
Tetracycline Iron supplements Decreased absorption of Drug 1 Moderate Separate doses by at least 2 hours
Clarithromycin Simvastatin Increased risk of myopathy High Avoid concurrent use or monitor CK levels
Warfarin Aspirin Increased risk of bleeding High Monitor INR closely; consider alternative therapy
Simvastatin Grapefruit juice Increased levels of Drug 1 Moderate Avoid concurrent use
Metformin Cimetidine Increased levels of Drug 1 Moderate Adjust dose or monitor blood glucose

Furosemide Aminoglycosides Increased risk of ototoxicity High Avoid combination or monitor hearing function
Carbamazepine Erythromycin Increased levels of Drug 1 High Monitor Carbamazepine levels; adjust dose
Methotrexate NSAIDs Increased risk of methotrexate toxicity High Avoid combination or monitor closely
Phenytoin Oral contraceptives Decreased effectiveness of Drug 2 High Use alternative contraception
Sildenafil Nitrates Severe hypotension High Contraindicated; avoid combination
Levothyroxine Calcium supplements Decreased absorption of Drug 1 Moderate Separate doses by at least 4 hours
Diltiazem Beta-blockers Increased risk of bradycardia High Monitor heart rate; adjust therapy if needed
Azithromycin Warfarin Increased risk of bleeding Moderate Monitor INR; adjust Warfarin dose as needed
Isoniazid Phenytoin Increased levels of Drug 2 Moderate Monitor Phenytoin levels; adjust dose
Quinolones Corticosteroids Increased risk of tendon rupture Moderate Advise patient on risks; monitor for symptoms
Ketoconazole Cyclosporine Increased levels of Drug 2 High Monitor Cyclosporine levels; adjust dose
SSRIs MAOIs Increased risk of serotonin syndrome High Contraindicated; avoid combination
Methotrexate Trimethoprim Increased risk of bone marrow suppression High Avoid combination if possible
Tamoxifen Warfarin Increased risk of bleeding High Monitor INR closely; adjust Warfarin dose
ACE inhibitors NSAIDs Reduced antihypertensive effect Moderate Monitor blood pressure; adjust therapy
Tetracycline Iron supplements Decreased absorption of Drug 1 Moderate Separate doses by at least 2 hours
Clarithromycin Simvastatin Increased risk of myopathy High Avoid concurrent use or monitor CK levels
Warfarin Aspirin Increased risk of bleeding High Monitor INR closely; consider alternative therapy
Simvastatin Grapefruit juice Increased levels of Drug 1 Moderate Avoid concurrent use
Metformin Cimetidine Increased levels of Drug 1 Moderate Adjust dose or monitor blood glucose

Phenytoin Oral contraceptives Decreased effectiveness of Drug 2 High Use alternative contraception
Sildenafil Nitrates Severe hypotension High Contraindicated; avoid combination
Levothyroxine Calcium supplements Decreased absorption of Drug 1 Moderate Separate doses by at least 4 hours
Diltiazem Beta-blockers Increased risk of bradycardia High Monitor heart rate; adjust therapy if needed
Azithromycin Warfarin Increased risk of bleeding Moderate Monitor INR; adjust Warfarin dose as needed
Isoniazid Phenytoin Increased levels of Drug 2 Moderate Monitor Phenytoin levels; adjust dose
Quinolones Corticosteroids Increased risk of tendon rupture Moderate Advise patient on risks; monitor for symptoms
Ketoconazole Cyclosporine Increased levels of Drug 2 High Monitor Cyclosporine levels; adjust dose
SSRIs MAOIs Increased risk of serotonin syndrome High Contraindicated; avoid combination
Methotrexate Trimethoprim Increased risk of bone marrow suppression High Avoid combination if possible
Tamoxifen Warfarin Increased risk of bleeding High Monitor INR closely; adjust Warfarin dose
ACE inhibitors NSAIDs Reduced antihypertensive effect Moderate Monitor blood pressure; adjust therapy
Tetracycline Iron supplements Decreased absorption of Drug 1 Moderate Separate doses by at least 2 hours
Clarithromycin Simvastatin Increased risk of myopathy High Avoid concurrent use or monitor CK levels
Warfarin Aspirin Increased risk of bleeding High Monitor INR closely; consider alternative therapy
Simvastatin Grapefruit juice Increased levels of Drug 1 Moderate Avoid concurrent use
Metformin Cimetidine Increased levels of Drug 1 Moderate Adjust dose or monitor blood glucose
Digoxin Verapamil Increased levels of Drug 1 High Monitor Digoxin levels; adjust dose if necessary
Clopidogrel Omeprazole Reduced effectiveness of Drug 1 Moderate Consider alternative PPI or monitor
Fluoxetine Tramadol Increased risk of serotonin syndrome High Avoid combination if possible
Lisinopril Spironolactone Increased risk of hyperkalemia High Monitor serum potassium levels

Rifampin Oral contraceptives Decreased effectiveness of Drug 2 High Use alternative contraception

Furosemide Aminoglycosides Increased risk of ototoxicity High Avoid combination or monitor hearing function

Diltiazem Beta-blockers Increased risk of bradycardia High Monitor heart rate; adjust therapy if needed
Azithromycin Warfarin Increased risk of bleeding Moderate Monitor INR; adjust Warfarin dose as needed
Isoniazid Phenytoin Increased levels of Drug 2 Moderate Monitor Phenytoin levels; adjust dose
Quinolones Corticosteroids Increased risk of tendon rupture Moderate Advise patient on risks; monitor for symptoms
Ketoconazole Cyclosporine Increased levels of Drug 2 High Monitor Cyclosporine levels; adjust dose
SSRIs MAOIs Increased risk of serotonin syndrome High Contraindicated; avoid combination
Methotrexate Trimethoprim Increased risk of bone marrow suppression High Avoid combination if possible
Tamoxifen Warfarin Increased risk of bleeding High Monitor INR closely; adjust Warfarin dose
ACE inhibitors NSAIDs Reduced antihypertensive effect Moderate Monitor blood pressure; adjust therapy
Tetracycline Iron supplements Decreased absorption of Drug 1 Moderate Separate doses by at least 2 hours
Clarithromycin Simvastatin Increased risk of myopathy High Avoid concurrent use or monitor CK levels
Warfarin Aspirin Increased risk of bleeding High Monitor INR closely; consider alternative therapy
Simvastatin Grapefruit juice Increased levels of Drug 1 Moderate Avoid concurrent use
Metformin Cimetidine Increased levels of Drug 1 Moderate Adjust dose or monitor blood glucose
Digoxin Verapamil Increased levels of Drug 1 High Monitor Digoxin levels; adjust dose if necessary
Clopidogrel Omeprazole Reduced effectiveness of Drug 1 Moderate Consider alternative PPI or monitor
Fluoxetine Tramadol Increased risk of serotonin syndrome High Avoid combination if possible
Lisinopril Spironolactone Increased risk of hyperkalemia High Monitor serum potassium levels
Amiodarone Warfarin Increased risk of bleeding High Monitor INR closely; adjust Warfarin dose
Rifampin Oral contraceptives Decreased effectiveness of Drug 2 High Use alternative contraception

Quinolones Corticosteroids Increased risk of tendon rupture Moderate Advise patient on risks; monitor for symptoms
Ketoconazole Cyclosporine Increased levels of Drug 2 High Monitor Cyclosporine levels; adjust dose
SSRIs MAOIs Increased risk of serotonin syndrome High Contraindicated; avoid combination
Methotrexate Trimethoprim Increased risk of bone marrow suppression High Avoid combination if possible
Tamoxifen Warfarin Increased risk of bleeding High Monitor INR closely; adjust Warfarin dose
ACE inhibitors NSAIDs Reduced antihypertensive effect Moderate Monitor blood pressure; adjust therapy
Tetracycline Iron supplements Decreased absorption of Drug 1 Moderate Separate doses by at least 2 hours
Clarithromycin Simvastatin Increased risk of myopathy High Avoid concurrent use or monitor CK levels
Warfarin Aspirin Increased risk of bleeding High Monitor INR closely; consider alternative therapy
Simvastatin Grapefruit juice Increased levels of Drug 1 Moderate Avoid concurrent use
Metformin Cimetidine Increased levels of Drug 1 Moderate Adjust dose or monitor blood glucose
Digoxin Verapamil Increased levels of Drug 1 High Monitor Digoxin levels; adjust dose if necessary
Clopidogrel Omeprazole Reduced effectiveness of Drug 1 Moderate Consider alternative PPI or monitor
Fluoxetine Tramadol Increased risk of serotonin syndrome High Avoid combination if possible
Lisinopril Spironolactone Increased risk of hyperkalemia High Monitor serum potassium levels
Amiodarone Warfarin Increased risk of bleeding High Monitor INR closely; adjust Warfarin dose
Rifampin Oral contraceptives Decreased effectiveness of Drug 2 High Use alternative contraception
Amitriptyline Fluoxetine Increased risk of serotonin syndrome High Monitor for serotonin syndrome
Ciprofloxacin Theophylline Increased levels of Drug 2 Moderate Monitor Theophylline levels; adjust dose
Lithium Thiazide diuretics Increased risk of lithium toxicity High Monitor lithium levels; consider dose adjustment
Enalapril Potassium supplements Increased risk of hyperkalemia Moderate Monitor serum potassium levels
Furosemide Aminoglycosides Increased risk of ototoxicity High Avoid combination or monitor hearing function

Methotrexate NSAIDs Increased risk of methotrexate toxicity High Avoid combination or monitor closely

Methotrexate Trimethoprim Increased risk of bone marrow suppression High Avoid combination if possible
Tamoxifen Warfarin Increased risk of bleeding High Monitor INR closely; adjust Warfarin dose
ACE inhibitors NSAIDs Reduced antihypertensive effect Moderate Monitor blood pressure; adjust therapy
Tetracycline Iron supplements Decreased absorption of Drug 1 Moderate Separate doses by at least 2 hours
Clarithromycin Simvastatin Increased risk of myopathy High Avoid concurrent use or monitor CK levels
Warfarin Aspirin Increased risk of bleeding High Monitor INR closely; consider alternative therapy
Simvastatin Grapefruit juice Increased levels of Drug 1 Moderate Avoid concurrent use
Metformin Cimetidine Increased levels of Drug 1 Moderate Adjust dose or monitor blood glucose
Digoxin Verapamil Increased levels of Drug 1 High Monitor Digoxin levels; adjust dose if necessary
Clopidogrel Omeprazole Reduced effectiveness of Drug 1 Moderate Consider alternative PPI or monitor
Fluoxetine Tramadol Increased risk of serotonin syndrome High Avoid combination if possible
Lisinopril Spironolactone Increased risk of hyperkalemia High Monitor serum potassium levels
Amiodarone Warfarin Increased risk of bleeding High Monitor INR closely; adjust Warfarin dose
Rifampin Oral contraceptives Decreased effectiveness of Drug 2 High Use alternative contraception
Amitriptyline Fluoxetine Increased risk of serotonin syndrome High Monitor for serotonin syndrome
Ciprofloxacin Theophylline Increased levels of Drug 2 Moderate Monitor Theophylline levels; adjust dose
Lithium Thiazide diuretics Increased risk of lithium toxicity High Monitor lithium levels; consider dose adjustment
Enalapril Potassium supplements Increased risk of hyperkalemia Moderate Monitor serum potassium levels
Furosemide Aminoglycosides Increased risk of ototoxicity High Avoid combination or monitor hearing function

Tetracycline Iron supplements Decreased absorption of Drug 1 Moderate Separate doses by at least 2 hours
Clarithromycin Simvastatin Increased risk of myopathy High Avoid concurrent use or monitor CK levels
Warfarin Aspirin Increased risk of bleeding High Monitor INR closely; consider alternative therapy
Simvastatin Grapefruit juice Increased levels of Drug 1 Moderate Avoid concurrent use
Metformin Cimetidine Increased levels of Drug 1 Moderate Adjust dose or monitor blood glucose
Digoxin Verapamil Increased levels of Drug 1 High Monitor Digoxin levels; adjust dose if necessary
Clopidogrel Omeprazole Reduced effectiveness of Drug 1 Moderate Consider alternative PPI or monitor
Fluoxetine Tramadol Increased risk of serotonin syndrome High Avoid combination if possible
Lisinopril Spironolactone Increased risk of hyperkalemia High Monitor serum potassium levels
Amiodarone Warfarin Increased risk of bleeding High Monitor INR closely; adjust Warfarin dose
Rifampin Oral contraceptives Decreased effectiveness of Drug 2 High Use alternative contraception
Amitriptyline Fluoxetine Increased risk of serotonin syndrome High Monitor for serotonin syndrome
Ciprofloxacin Theophylline Increased levels of Drug 2 Moderate Monitor Theophylline levels; adjust dose
Lithium Thiazide diuretics Increased risk of lithium toxicity High Monitor lithium levels; consider dose adjustment
Enalapril Potassium supplements Increased risk of hyperkalemia Moderate Monitor serum potassium levels
Furosemide Aminoglycosides Increased risk of ototoxicity High Avoid combination or monitor hearing function
Carbamazepine Erythromycin Increased levels of Drug 1 High Monitor Carbamazepine levels; adjust dose
Methotrexate NSAIDs Increased risk of methotrexate toxicity High Avoid combination or monitor closely
Phenytoin Oral contraceptives Decreased effectiveness of Drug 2 High Use alternative contraception

Warfarin Aspirin Increased risk of bleeding High Monitor INR closely; consider alternative therapy
Simvastatin Grapefruit juice Increased levels of Drug 1 Moderate Avoid concurrent use
Metformin Cimetidine Increased levels of Drug 1 Moderate Adjust dose or monitor blood glucose
Digoxin Verapamil Increased levels of Drug 1 High Monitor Digoxin levels; adjust dose if necessary
Clopidogrel Omeprazole Reduced effectiveness of Drug 1 Moderate Consider alternative PPI or monitor
Fluoxetine Tramadol Increased risk of serotonin syndrome High Avoid combination if possible
Lisinopril Spironolactone Increased risk of hyperkalemia High Monitor serum potassium levels
Amiodarone Warfarin Increased risk of bleeding High Monitor INR closely; adjust Warfarin dose
Rifampin Oral contraceptives Decreased effectiveness of Drug 2 High Use alternative contraception
Amitriptyline Fluoxetine Increased risk of serotonin syndrome High Monitor for serotonin syndrome
Ciprofloxacin Theophylline Increased levels of Drug 2 Moderate Monitor Theophylline levels; adjust dose
Lithium Thiazide diuretics Increased risk of lithium toxicity High Monitor lithium levels; consider dose adjustment
Enalapril Potassium supplements Increased risk of hyperkalemia Moderate Monitor serum potassium levels
Furosemide Aminoglycosides Increased risk of ototoxicity High Avoid combination or monitor hearing function
Carbamazepine Erythromycin Increased levels of Drug 1 High Monitor Carbamazepine levels; adjust dose
Methotrexate NSAIDs Increased risk of methotrexate toxicity High Avoid combination or monitor closely
Phenytoin Oral contraceptives Decreased effectiveness of Drug 2 High Use alternative contraception
Sildenafil Nitrates Severe hypotension High Contraindicated; avoid combination
Levothyroxine Calcium supplements Decreased absorption of Drug 1 Moderate Separate doses by at least 4 hours
Diltiazem Beta-blockers Increased risk of bradycardia High Monitor heart rate; adjust therapy if needed
Azithromycin Warfarin Increased risk of bleeding Moderate Monitor INR; adjust Warfarin dose as needed
Isoniazid Phenytoin Increased levels of Drug 2 Moderate Monitor Phenytoin levels; adjust dose
Quinolones Corticosteroids Increased risk of tendon rupture Moderate Advise patient on risks; monitor for symptoms
Ketoconazole Cyclosporine Increased levels of Drug 2 High Monitor Cyclosporine levels; adjust dose
SSRIs MAOIs Increased risk of serotonin syndrome High Contraindicated; avoid combination
Methotrexate Trimethoprim Increased risk of bone marrow suppression High Avoid combination if possible
Tamoxifen Warfarin Increased risk of bleeding High Monitor INR closely; adjust Warfarin dose
ACE inhibitors NSAIDs Reduced antihypertensive effect Moderate Monitor blood pressure; adjust therapy

Clopidogrel Omeprazole Reduced effectiveness of Drug 1 Moderate Consider alternative PPI or monitor
Fluoxetine Tramadol Increased risk of serotonin syndrome High Avoid combination if possible
Lisinopril Spironolactone Increased risk of hyperkalemia High Monitor serum potassium levels
Amiodarone Warfarin Increased risk of bleeding High Monitor INR closely; adjust Warfarin dose
Rifampin Oral contraceptives Decreased effectiveness of Drug 2 High Use alternative contraception
Amitriptyline Fluoxetine Increased risk of serotonin syndrome High Monitor for serotonin syndrome
Ciprofloxacin Theophylline Increased levels of Drug 2 Moderate Monitor Theophylline levels; adjust dose
Lithium Thiazide diuretics Increased risk of lithium toxicity High Monitor lithium levels; consider dose adjustment
Enalapril Potassium supplements Increased risk of hyperkalemia Moderate Monitor serum potassium levels
Furosemide Aminoglycosides Increased risk of ototoxicity High Avoid combination or monitor hearing function
Carbamazepine Erythromycin Increased levels of Drug 1 High Monitor Carbamazepine levels; adjust dose
Methotrexate NSAIDs Increased risk of methotrexate toxicity High Avoid combination or monitor closely
Phenytoin Oral contraceptives Decreased effectiveness of Drug 2 High Use alternative contraception
Sildenafil Nitrates Severe hypotension High Contraindicated; avoid combination
Levothyroxine Calcium supplements Decreased absorption of Drug 1 Moderate Separate doses by at least 4 hours

Amiodarone Warfarin Increased risk of bleeding High Monitor INR closely; adjust Warfarin dose
Rifampin Oral contraceptives Decreased effectiveness of Drug 2 High Use alternative contraception
Amitriptyline Fluoxetine Increased risk of serotonin syndrome High Monitor for serotonin syndrome
Ciprofloxacin Theophylline Increased levels of Drug 2 Moderate Monitor Theophylline levels; adjust dose
Lithium Thiazide diuretics Increased risk of lithium toxicity High Monitor lithium levels; consider dose adjustment
Enalapril Potassium supplements Increased risk of hyperkalemia Moderate Monitor serum potassium levels
Furosemide Aminoglycosides Increased risk of ototoxicity High Avoid combination or monitor hearing function
Carbamazepine Erythromycin Increased levels of Drug 1 High Monitor Carbamazepine levels; adjust dose
Methotrexate NSAIDs Increased risk of methotrexate toxicity High Avoid combination or monitor closely
Phenytoin Oral contraceptives Decreased effectiveness of Drug 2 High Use alternative contraception
Sildenafil Nitrates Severe hypotension High Contraindicated; avoid combination
Levothyroxine Calcium supplements Decreased absorption of Drug 1 Moderate Separate doses by at least 4 hours
Diltiazem Beta-blockers Increased risk of bradycardia High Monitor heart rate; adjust therapy if needed
Azithromycin Warfarin Increased risk of bleeding Moderate Monitor INR; adjust Warfarin dose as needed
Isoniazid Phenytoin Increased levels of Drug 2 Moderate Monitor Phenytoin levels; adjust dose
Quinolones Corticosteroids Increased risk of tendon rupture Moderate Advise patient on risks; monitor for symptoms
Ketoconazole Cyclosporine Increased levels of Drug 2 High Monitor Cyclosporine levels; adjust dose

Methotrexate Trimethoprim Increased risk of bone marrow suppression High Avoid combination if possible
Tamoxifen Warfarin Increased risk of bleeding High Monitor INR closely; adjust Warfarin dose
ACE inhibitors NSAIDs Reduced antihypertensive effect Moderate Monitor blood pressure; adjust therapy

Ciprofloxacin Theophylline Increased levels of Drug 2 Moderate Monitor Theophylline levels; adjust dose
Lithium Thiazide diuretics Increased risk of lithium toxicity High Monitor lithium levels; consider dose adjustment
Enalapril Potassium supplements Increased risk of hyperkalemia Moderate Monitor serum potassium levels
Furosemide Aminoglycosides Increased risk of ototoxicity High Avoid combination or monitor hearing function
Carbamazepine Erythromycin Increased levels of Drug 1 High Monitor Carbamazepine levels; adjust dose
Methotrexate NSAIDs Increased risk of methotrexate toxicity High Avoid combination or monitor closely
Phenytoin Oral contraceptives Decreased effectiveness of Drug 2 High Use alternative contraception
Sildenafil Nitrates Severe hypotension High Contraindicated; avoid combination
Levothyroxine Calcium supplements Decreased absorption of Drug 1 Moderate Separate doses by at least 4 hours
Diltiazem Beta-blockers Increased risk of bradycardia High Monitor heart rate; adjust therapy if needed
Azithromycin Warfarin Increased risk of bleeding Moderate Monitor INR; adjust Warfarin dose as needed
Isoniazid Phenytoin Increased levels of Drug 2 Moderate Monitor Phenytoin levels; adjust dose
Quinolones Corticosteroids Increased risk of tendon rupture Moderate Advise patient on risks; monitor for symptoms
Ketoconazole Cyclosporine Increased levels of Drug 2 High Monitor Cyclosporine levels; adjust dose
SSRIs MAOIs Increased risk of serotonin syndrome High Contraindicated; avoid combination
Methotrexate Trimethoprim Increased risk of bone marrow suppression High Avoid combination if possible
Tamoxifen Warfarin Increased risk of bleeding High Monitor INR closely; adjust Warfarin dose
ACE inhibitors NSAIDs Reduced antihypertensive effect Moderate Monitor blood pressure; adjust therapy
Tetracycline Iron supplements Decreased absorption of Drug 1 Moderate Separate doses by at least 2 hours
Clarithromycin Simvastatin Increased risk of myopathy High Avoid concurrent use or monitor CK levels
Warfarin Aspirin Increased risk of bleeding High Monitor INR closely; consider alternative therapy
Simvastatin Grapefruit juice Increased levels of Drug 1 Moderate Avoid concurrent use
Metformin Cimetidine Increased levels of Drug 1 Moderate Adjust dose or monitor blood glucose

Furosemide Aminoglycosides Increased risk of ototoxicity High Avoid combination or monitor hearing function
Carbamazepine Erythromycin Increased levels of Drug 1 High Monitor Carbamazepine levels; adjust dose
Methotrexate NSAIDs Increased risk of methotrexate toxicity High Avoid combination or monitor closely
Phenytoin Oral contraceptives Decreased effectiveness of Drug 2 High Use alternative contraception
Sildenafil Nitrates Severe hypotension High Contraindicated; avoid combination
Levothyroxine Calcium supplements Decreased absorption of Drug 1 Moderate Separate doses by at least 4 hours
Diltiazem Beta-blockers Increased risk of bradycardia High Monitor heart rate; adjust therapy if needed
Azithromycin Warfarin Increased risk of bleeding Moderate Monitor INR; adjust Warfarin dose as needed
Isoniazid Phenytoin Increased levels of Drug 2 Moderate Monitor Phenytoin levels; adjust dose
Quinolones Corticosteroids Increased risk of tendon rupture Moderate Advise patient on risks; monitor for symptoms
Ketoconazole Cyclosporine Increased levels of Drug 2 High Monitor Cyclosporine levels; adjust dose
SSRIs MAOIs Increased risk of serotonin syndrome High Contraindicated; avoid combination
Methotrexate Trimethoprim Increased risk of bone marrow suppression High Avoid combination if possible
Tamoxifen Warfarin Increased risk of bleeding High Monitor INR closely; adjust Warfarin dose
ACE inhibitors NSAIDs Reduced antihypertensive effect Moderate Monitor blood pressure; adjust therapy
Tetracycline Iron supplements Decreased absorption of Drug 1 Moderate Separate doses by at least 2 hours
Clarithromycin Simvastatin Increased risk of myopathy High Avoid concurrent use or monitor CK levels
Warfarin Aspirin Increased risk of bleeding High Monitor INR closely; consider alternative therapy
Simvastatin Grapefruit juice Increased levels of Drug 1 Moderate Avoid concurrent use
Metformin Cimetidine Increased levels of Drug 1 Moderate Adjust dose or monitor blood glucose

Phenytoin Oral contraceptives Decreased effectiveness of Drug 2 High Use alternative contraception
Sildenafil Nitrates Severe hypotension High Contraindicated; avoid combination
Levothyroxine Calcium supplements Decreased absorption of Drug 1 Moderate Separate doses by at least 4 hours
Diltiazem Beta-blockers Increased risk of bradycardia High Monitor heart rate; adjust therapy if needed
Azithromycin Warfarin Increased risk of bleeding Moderate Monitor INR; adjust Warfarin dose as needed
Isoniazid Phenytoin Increased levels of Drug 2 Moderate Monitor Phenytoin levels; adjust dose
Quinolones Corticosteroids Increased risk of tendon rupture Moderate Advise patient on risks; monitor for symptoms
Ketoconazole Cyclosporine Increased levels of Drug 2 High Monitor Cyclosporine levels; adjust dose
SSRIs MAOIs Increased risk of serotonin syndrome High Contraindicated; avoid combination
Methotrexate Trimethoprim Increased risk of bone marrow suppression High Avoid combination if possible
Tamoxifen Warfarin Increased risk of bleeding High Monitor INR closely; adjust Warfarin dose
ACE inhibitors NSAIDs Reduced antihypertensive effect Moderate Monitor blood pressure; adjust therapy
Tetracycline Iron supplements Decreased absorption of Drug 1 Moderate Separate doses by at least 2 hours
Clarithromycin Simvastatin Increased risk of myopathy High Avoid concurrent use or monitor CK levels
Warfarin Aspirin Increased risk of bleeding High Monitor INR closely; consider alternative therapy
Simvastatin Grapefruit juice Increased levels of Drug 1 Moderate Avoid concurrent use
Metformin Cimetidine Increased levels of Drug 1 Moderate Adjust dose or monitor blood glucose
Digoxin Verapamil Increased levels of Drug 1 High Monitor Digoxin levels; adjust dose if necessary
Clopidogrel Omeprazole Reduced effectiveness of Drug 1 Moderate Consider alternative PPI or monitor
Fluoxetine Tramadol Increased risk of serotonin syndrome High Avoid combination if possible
Lisinopril Spironolactone Increased risk of hyperkalemia High Monitor serum potassium levels

Rifampin Oral contraceptives Decreased effectiveness of Drug 2 High Use alternative contraception

Furosemide Aminoglycosides Increased risk of ototoxicity High Avoid combination or monitor hearing function

Diltiazem Beta-blockers Increased risk of bradycardia High Monitor heart rate; adjust therapy if needed
Azithromycin Warfarin Increased risk of bleeding Moderate Monitor INR; adjust Warfarin dose as needed
Isoniazid Phenytoin Increased levels of Drug 2 Moderate Monitor Phenytoin levels; adjust dose
Quinolones Corticosteroids Increased risk of tendon rupture Moderate Advise patient on risks; monitor for symptoms
Ketoconazole Cyclosporine Increased levels of Drug 2 High Monitor Cyclosporine levels; adjust dose
SSRIs MAOIs Increased risk of serotonin syndrome High Contraindicated; avoid combination
Methotrexate Trimethoprim Increased risk of bone marrow suppression High Avoid combination if possible
Tamoxifen Warfarin Increased risk of bleeding High Monitor INR closely; adjust Warfarin dose
ACE inhibitors NSAIDs Reduced antihypertensive effect Moderate Monitor blood pressure; adjust therapy
Tetracycline Iron supplements Decreased absorption of Drug 1 Moderate Separate doses by at least 2 hours
Clarithromycin Simvastatin Increased risk of myopathy High Avoid concurrent use or monitor CK levels
Warfarin Aspirin Increased risk of bleeding High Monitor INR closely; consider alternative therapy
Simvastatin Grapefruit juice Increased levels of Drug 1 Moderate Avoid concurrent use
Metformin Cimetidine Increased levels of Drug 1 Moderate Adjust dose or monitor blood glucose
Digoxin Verapamil Increased levels of Drug 1 High Monitor Digoxin levels; adjust dose if necessary
Clopidogrel Omeprazole Reduced effectiveness of Drug 1 Moderate Consider alternative PPI or monitor
Fluoxetine Tramadol Increased risk of serotonin syndrome High Avoid combination if possible
Lisinopril Spironolactone Increased risk of hyperkalemia High Monitor serum potassium levels
Amiodarone Warfarin Increased risk of bleeding High Monitor INR closely; adjust Warfarin dose
Rifampin Oral contraceptives Decreased effectiveness of Drug 2 High Use alternative contraception

Quinolones Corticosteroids Increased risk of tendon rupture Moderate Advise patient on risks; monitor for symptoms
Ketoconazole Cyclosporine Increased levels of Drug 2 High Monitor Cyclosporine levels; adjust dose
SSRIs MAOIs Increased risk of serotonin syndrome High Contraindicated; avoid combination
Methotrexate Trimethoprim Increased risk of bone marrow suppression High Avoid combination if possible
Tamoxifen Warfarin Increased risk of bleeding High Monitor INR closely; adjust Warfarin dose
ACE inhibitors NSAIDs Reduced antihypertensive effect Moderate Monitor blood pressure; adjust therapy
Tetracycline Iron supplements Decreased absorption of Drug 1 Moderate Separate doses by at least 2 hours
Clarithromycin Simvastatin Increased risk of myopathy High Avoid concurrent use or monitor CK levels
Warfarin Aspirin Increased risk of bleeding High Monitor INR closely; consider alternative therapy
Simvastatin Grapefruit juice Increased levels of Drug 1 Moderate Avoid concurrent use
Metformin Cimetidine Increased levels of Drug 1 Moderate Adjust dose or monitor blood glucose
Digoxin Verapamil Increased levels of Drug 1 High Monitor Digoxin levels; adjust dose if necessary
Clopidogrel Omeprazole Reduced effectiveness of Drug 1 Moderate Consider alternative PPI or monitor
Fluoxetine Tramadol Increased risk of serotonin syndrome High Avoid combination if possible
Lisinopril Spironolactone Increased risk of hyperkalemia High Monitor serum potassium levels
Amiodarone Warfarin Increased risk of bleeding High Monitor INR closely; adjust Warfarin dose
Rifampin Oral contraceptives Decreased effectiveness of Drug 2 High Use alternative contraception
Amitriptyline Fluoxetine Increased risk of serotonin syndrome High Monitor for serotonin syndrome
Ciprofloxacin Theophylline Increased levels of Drug 2 Moderate Monitor Theophylline levels; adjust dose
Lithium Thiazide diuretics Increased risk of lithium toxicity High Monitor lithium levels; consider dose adjustment
Enalapril Potassium supplements Increased risk of hyperkalemia Moderate Monitor serum potassium levels
Furosemide Aminoglycosides Increased risk of ototoxicity High Avoid combination or monitor hearing function

Methotrexate NSAIDs Increased risk of methotrexate toxicity High Avoid combination or monitor closely

Methotrexate Trimethoprim Increased risk of bone marrow suppression High Avoid combination if possible
Tamoxifen Warfarin Increased risk of bleeding High Monitor INR closely; adjust Warfarin dose
ACE inhibitors NSAIDs Reduced antihypertensive effect Moderate Monitor blood pressure; adjust therapy
Tetracycline Iron supplements Decreased absorption of Drug 1 Moderate Separate doses by at least 2 hours
Clarithromycin Simvastatin Increased risk of myopathy High Avoid concurrent use or monitor CK levels
Warfarin Aspirin Increased risk of bleeding High Monitor INR closely; consider alternative therapy
Simvastatin Grapefruit juice Increased levels of Drug 1 Moderate Avoid concurrent use
Metformin Cimetidine Increased levels of Drug 1 Moderate Adjust dose or monitor blood glucose
Digoxin Verapamil Increased levels of Drug 1 High Monitor Digoxin levels; adjust dose if necessary
Clopidogrel Omeprazole Reduced effectiveness of Drug 1 Moderate Consider alternative PPI or monitor
Fluoxetine Tramadol Increased risk of serotonin syndrome High Avoid combination if possible
Lisinopril Spironolactone Increased risk of hyperkalemia High Monitor serum potassium levels
Amiodarone Warfarin Increased risk of bleeding High Monitor INR closely; adjust Warfarin dose
Rifampin Oral contraceptives Decreased effectiveness of Drug 2 High Use alternative contraception
Amitriptyline Fluoxetine Increased risk of serotonin syndrome High Monitor for serotonin syndrome
Ciprofloxacin Theophylline Increased levels of Drug 2 Moderate Monitor Theophylline levels; adjust dose
Lithium Thiazide diuretics Increased risk of lithium toxicity High Monitor lithium levels; consider dose adjustment
Enalapril Potassium supplements Increased risk of hyperkalemia Moderate Monitor serum potassium levels
Furosemide Aminoglycosides Increased risk of ototoxicity High Avoid combination or monitor hearing function
Carbamazepine Erythromycin Increased levels of Drug 1 High Monitor Carbamazepine levels; adjust dose
Methotrexate NSAIDs Increased risk of methotrexate toxicity High Avoid combination or monitor closely
Phenytoin Oral contraceptives Decreased effectiveness of Drug 2 High Use alternative contraception
Sildenafil Nitrates Severe hypotension High Contraindicated; avoid combination
Levothyroxine Calcium supplements Decreased absorption of Drug 1 Moderate Separate doses by at least 4 hours
Diltiazem Beta-blockers Increased risk of bradycardia High Monitor heart rate; adjust therapy if needed
Azithromycin Warfarin Increased risk of bleeding Moderate Monitor INR; adjust Warfarin dose as needed
Isoniazid Phenytoin Increased levels of Drug 2 Moderate Monitor Phenytoin levels; adjust dose
Quinolones Corticosteroids Increased risk of tendon rupture Moderate Advise patient on risks; monitor for symptoms
